OOC: I guess that Icedemon didn't take his character so still I have 
to play with them.


Condor/Wizard::

Condor shot his weapons against Vehemet (25 shots)

***********

Wizard::

"I see that you wish play a while... I'M READY TO PLAY!!!!" he shot 
against Reflector (25 shots)



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (I was at a friend's house Friday and Saturday.  A snow day bailed 
me out of 
> mass homework and so I went over to my friend's house early, and 
didn't go to 
> sleep 'til one in the morning on Saturday, so I didn't post for the 
rest of 
> the day.  I've noticed no one has posted damage for Reflector's 
attack)
> 
> Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:
> 
> 
> 
> An explosion sent the drained Vehement to the ground, a great 
amount of metal 
> digging into his back.  Looking up, he managed to fire a single 
bolt of optic 
> energy at one of five incoming grenades.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher ducked to a knee, yelling out in pain as he was hit by 
the 
> explosion, his burned back causing great pain with every movement.  
He fired 
> off three optic blasts at three incoming grenades, receiving inner 
monoluge 
> orders from the Chaos-Bringer.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector transformed to his biped mode, firing a two optic blasts 
at an 
> incoming grenade, the explosion of the shuttle from behind sending 
him 
> flipping once through the air, and landing painfully on his back.
